original_title: A Vida Breve de António Fragoso
overview: Documentary about the inspired Portuguese pianist and composer António de Lima Fragoso (1897-1918), who died at a very young age (21), victim of the Spanish flu. Includes some of his compositions, as well as several testimonials about his life and work.
tagline: Documentary about Portuguese pianist and composer António de Lima Fragoso (1897-1918).
title: The Brief Life of António Fragoso
